user_request: View the shopping cart on amazon. Search for razer nari on amazon, select the first entry, and add it to the cart.
screen_desc: The screenshot shows a product page for a headset on Amazon. It is currently being offered at a 50% discount for $49.99, down from the original price of $99.99. The shipping fee to the Netherlands is $15.17, with a delivery window from December 15 to 30. The product is listed as shipping within 1 to 2 months, and options to "Add to Cart" or "Buy Now" are available. The page also displays secure transaction information and return policy details.
history_actions: click on the Amazon app icon located at the right lower part of the screen.
click on the located at the top.
click on the search suggestion for amazon.com located at the upper left.
click on the shopping cart icon located at the top right.
click on the amazon search bar located at the upper part of the screen, and below the amazon icon.
click on the search result located at the upper left.
click on the product entry "Razer Nari Essential Wireless 7.1 Surround Sound Gaming Headset" located at the middle of the screen.
click on the "Add to Cart" button located at the middle and lower middle part of the screen.

think.Thought: The user has already successfully added the 'Razer Nari Essential Wireless 7.1 Surround Sound Gaming Headset' to their cart. The next step should be to view the shopping cart to review the added item.
Future Action Plan: Click on the shopping cart icon located at the top right to view the cart.
